title: Public Health Madison & Dane County
cleaned_text: Vaccination Appointments Make Sure You are Eligible Most people ages six months and older [are eligible](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/stay-up-to-date.html). We have not yet received eligibility information for the fall 2023 COVID vaccine. How it Works Scheduling a COVID-19 vaccination appointment at a mass vaccination clinic is easy! Appointments are recommended. We accept walk-ins, but availability is not guaranteed. [Click the location](#locations)you would like to visit below (each location is open at different times). - Fill out the registration form. If registering at South Madison, East Washington, or the libraries, click on the vaccine you need and then select your appointment time. - Get vaccinated! I'm making an appointment for more than one person. If you are making appointments for your child, you should make an appointment for each recipient. For example, if you and your two kids are all getting vaccinated, make three separate appointments. You can use the same phone and email address for all appointments, but please use different names for each appointment. Vaccination Locations Note: all these sites are walk in clinics. We do not offer drive-thru vaccination at this time. South Park Street Clinic Vaccine Provider: Public Health Madison & Dane County 2230 S. Park Street, Madison Mondays, 10 am - 6 pm [Make an appointment at South Park Street Clinic](https://PHMDCvaccine.as.me/?calendarID=5528329) East Washington Ave Clinic Vaccine Provider: Public Health Madison & Dane County 2705 E. Washington Ave, Madison Tuesdays, 10 am - 6 pm [Make an appointment at E. Washington Ave Clinic](https://PHMDCvaccine.as.me/?calendarID=5528446) DeForest Area Public Library Wednesdays, 12:30 pm - 5:00 pm [Make an appointment at DeForest Area Public Library](https://PHMDCvaccine.as.me/?calendarID=6451551) Madison Public Library - Goodman South Madison 2222 S. Park Street, Madison Wednesdays, 12:30 pm - 3:30 pm [Make an appointment at Madison Public Library - Goodman South Madison](https://phmdcvaccine.as.me/schedule.php?calendarID=6442454) Madison Public Library - Lakeview 2845 N. Sherman Ave, Madison Tuesdays, 3 pm - 6 pm [Make an appointment at Madison Public Library - Lakeview](https://app.acuityscheduling.com/schedule.php?owner=21476684&calendarID=6461144) Sun Prairie Public Library Vaccine Provider: Public Health Madison & Dane County 1350 Linnerud Drive, Sun Prairie [MAKE
